summary.Title: cooks in kitchen / kokke søges
summary.Presentation: Stillingsopslag / Jobs for cooks.   English translation down below.Cafe Fatamorgana is looking for two chefs who can work full-time in the kitchen.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Stillingsopslag / Jobs for cooks.   

English translation down below.


Cafe Fatamorgana is looking for two chefs who can work full-time in the kitchen.


Job description:


We are looking for committed and responsible chefs to join our team!

Your tasks will consist of the following tasks:

Preparation of raw materials and cooking tasks. Serving and serving, furthermore, the employee must ensure hygiene in accordance with applicable rules.

Likewise, it is important for our workplace and team that you as an employee are service-minded and can work in a team, you have an eye for quality and detail. You must be able to thrive in a sometimes busy work environment, and have a minimum of one year's experience in cooking.


We offer a flexible workplace with good colleagues and a focus on a good working environment.

Vi håber at høre fra ansøgere snarest/ we are looking forward to receive applicants.


Best regards, 

Cafe Fatamorgana.





Cafe Fatamorgana søger to kokke, som kan arbejde fultid i køkkenet.


Jobbeskrivelse:


Vi søger engageret og ansvarsfulde kokke til vores team!

Dine opgaver kommer til at bestå af følgende arbejdsopgaver:

Forberedelse af råvarer og madlavningsopgaver. Anretning og servering, ydermere skal medarbejderen sikre hygiejne i henhold til gældende regler.

Ligeledes er det vigtigt for vores arbejdsplads og team, at du som medarbejder er serviceminded og kan arbejde i et team, du har sans for kvalitet og detaljer. Du skal kunne trives i et til tider travlt arbejdsmiljø, og have minimum et års erfaring inden for madlavning.


Vi tilbyder en fleksibel arbejdsplads med gode kollegaer og fokus på godt arbejdsmiljø.

Bh, 


Cafe Fatamorgana

Occupation.Name: Kok
AlternateNames: Kok med speciale i bagværk og kager
